parameters: \c[2]??? \c[0]Yes, my name is Ye Jingshan, nice to meet you.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Dr. Ye, thank you for taking care of me.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]I'm a doctor, saving people is my job.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]By the way, I've never seen you around, did you transfer here recently?
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Yeah, I just checked in yesterday.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]No wonder. Qingtan is very humid, newcomers don't adapt easily, just make
sure you get plenty of rest.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]You're rare, every cop I know is a chain smoker.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]Especially the experienced ones, they can't solve any cases without cigarettes.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]I haven't handled a case yet, so I can't relate.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]Oh, donât tell anyone I smoke.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]I always tell the old folks here to smoke less and I can't justify it
if they find out I smoke too.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Dr. Ye, is that Wang Jincaiâs store next door?
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Nothing, I encountered something strange at the funeral,
so I'm just trying to understand the situation.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Do you know how Wang Jincai died?
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]His body was found several days after he died,
I haven't seen the corpse, so it's hard to say.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]The people in town are saying that he died horribly,
as if \c[1]he was killed by a ghost\c[0].
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]About that, it probably has something to do with the \c[1]familicide\c[0] that happened some time ago.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Are you talking about the Tian family case? I saw it on TV.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]Yeah. After the Tian family died, Wang Jincai had told everyone that Tianâs \c[1]daughter-in-law\c[0] was a madwoman...
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]He said she went crazy and murdered the whole family.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]Everyone thinks that the daughter-in-lawâs spirit killed Wang Jincai because he spoke ill of her.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]Of course, I'm a doctor, I don't believe in such superstitions.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]Wang Jincai had cardiovascular disease so he probably died from a heart attack...
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]I think the circuit breaker tripped. Iâll go and have a look.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]Officer, you might want to grab some candles \c[1]in the black van outside\c[0].
There are traces of something that was once hung on the wall.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]It looks like an award banner.
It seems that an award banner was taken down from the wall.
There are some medical books on the table.
\c[2]??? \c[0]You should have heard of the Tian family case, right?
\c[1]Zhao Xiaojuan\c[0] was at your clinic half an hour before the incident.
\c[2]??? \c[0]We want to know why she was there, her diagnosis,
the kind of medicine she purchased, and her mental state at that time.
\c[2]??? \c[0]I hope you'll cooperate with us and call us back as soon as possible.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]Zhao Xiaojuan did come to the clinic before the incident.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]She said her mother-in-law had a bad cough and wanted to buy some \c[1]medicine for coughing\c[0].
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]She left after buying the medicine.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]The people in the clinic saw her. I still have a copy of the receipt for the medicine. Please contact me again if you have any further questions.
The sound of a car starting is coming from outside the door.
